title: Business Analyst
description:
We are seeking a skilled Business Analyst with a minimum of 7 years of experience in the technology sector. They will be responsible for collaborating with cross-functional teams to analyse business requirements and convert them into well-defined stories. The Business Analyst will also play a critical role in identifying and implementing innovative solutions to improve business processes.




Responsibilities:

Act as the voice of the customer/user and collaborate with internal teams to understand and document business requirements
Create detailed documentation of business requirements, processes, and solutions.
Translate requirements into technical specifications that can be easily understood by the development team
Work with IT and other departments to implement solutions and ensure they align with business goals.
Work with and report to CXOs to ensure that the application meets the business objectives and is aligned with the overall business strategy
Conduct research and analysis to identify and evaluate potential enhancements or new features for the application
Collaborate with the QA team to ensure that the application meets the quality standards and Requirements
Communicate findings, recommendations, and project updates to stakeholders and executives.




Required Qualifications/Experience:

Bachelor’s degree in business administration, Computer Science, or a related field
Minimum of 7 years of experience in business analyst role, with a focus on technology (.Net stack preferred)
Knowledge on API Development desirable.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Strong communication and interpersonal skills to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and with CXO leaders
